events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has requested a refund due to sizing issues with the jacket they received and wants a money back.
Assigning refund specialist to handle the customer's request for a refund of the jacket order.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request regarding the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process it quickly?
Sure, my order number is #54321. The jacket is much smaller than described and doesn't fit at all.
We have processed your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
The refund case is now closed on our end. Once we receive the return, your payment will be refunded within 3-5 business days.
We are just following up to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
